Title: Workers as well as peasants shoulder the Great Leap equally, city and countryside both welcome a year of plenty
Designer: Tan Yujian (谭裕剑)Yang Jiacong (杨家聪)
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: A protective doorposter (menshen, 门神) for both sides of the door, with many traditional elements. The countryside is shown on the right side (agriculture, peasants), the city on the left (industry, science, workers).
